GitHub portfolio highlights

Engineering

  • ansible-setup - This is an Ansible project for quick environment setup.
  • cka-bookmarks - The Collection of Kubernetes Bookmarks for CKA / CKAD Exam Preparation.
  • gcp-firewall-scanner - A simple tool designed to scan Google Cloud Platform (GCP) firewall rules and identify any unused rules.
  • go-functional-options - golang functional options pattern.
  • iterm2-preferences - My iTerm2 preferences.
  • leetcode - Preparing for coding interviews.
  • nvim - My personal configuration for Neovim.
  • redis-redisinsight - Offline memory analysis of Redis.
  • terraform-cloud - Apply Terraform with Terraform Cloud.
  • terraform-etcd - Deploy an etcd cluster with 3 nodes.
  • terraform-redis - Manage Redis Enterprise with Terraform.

Game
